actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution limiting the eligibility of Representatives and Senators for the Presidency or Vice Presidency.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - States that no person who has been a Representative or a Senator shall be eligible to become President or Vice President until the end of the two-year period beginning on the last date on which such person was a Representative or Senator.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution limiting the eligibility of Representatives and Senators for the Presidency or Vice Presidency.
